      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660f-5244-41d1-2bf4-91f6d8567e77#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Mirabello Cavalori: Egy gyapjúszövő gyár, 1570-72, Palazzo Vecchio, Firenze, olaj, falfestmény.</string>
            <string language="en">Mirabello Cavalori: The Wool Factory, 1570-72, Palazzo Vecchio, Florence, oil, canvas.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mirabello Cavalori: Die Wolle-Fabrik, 
1570-72, Palazzo Vecchio, Florenz, Öl, Segeltuch.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mirabello Cavalori : L'usine de laines, 
1570-72, Palazzo Vecchio, Florence, huile, toile.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mirabello Cavalori: A fábrica de lãs, 
1570-72, Palazzo Vecchio, Florença, óleo, lona.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mirabello Cavalori: La fabbrica delle lane, 
1570-72, Palazzo Vecchio, Firenze, olio, tela di canapa.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Mirabello Cavalori: Το εργοστάσιο μαλλιού, 
1570-72, Palazzo Vecchio, Φλωρεντία, πετρέλαιο, καμβάς.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mirabello Cavalori: La fábrica de las 
lanas, 1570-72, Palazzo Vecchio, Florencia, aceite, lona.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Cavalori a Vasari-iskolához tartozott, Vasari egyik legtehetségesebb tanítványa.</string>
            <string language="en">Cavalor followed the Vasari-school, he was Vasari’s one of the most talented disciple.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Vasari,  Cavalori,  studiolo,  Palazzo Vecchio,  </string>
            <string language="en">Vasari, Cavalori, studiolo, Palazzo Vecchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Cavalor folgte der Vasari-Schule, er war Vasari?s eins des
begabtesten Schülers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cavalor a suivi la Vasari-école, il était Vasari?s un du
disciple le plus doué.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cavalor seguiu a Vasari-escola, ele era Vasari?s um do 
disciple o mais talented.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cavalor ha seguito la Vasari-scuola, lui era Vasari?s uno 
del disciple più di talento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Cavalor ακολούθησε το βασαρη-σχολείο, ήταν 
Vasari?s ένας από τον πιό ταλαντούχο απόστολο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cavalor siguió la Vasari-escuela, él era Vasari?s uno 
del discípulo más talentoso.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vasari, Cavalori, studiolo, Palazzo Vecchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vasari, Cavalori, studiolo, Palazzo Vecchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vasari, Cavalori, studiolo, Palazzo Vecchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Vasari, Cavalori, studiolo, Palazzo Vecchio</string>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
